definition: special correspondent/sb dispatched on a mission/special commissioner
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Your excellency, special agent Fleury of the Federal Bureau of Investigation and his colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 閣下，這是美國聯邦調查局特派員弗勒裏和他的同僚。

sentences.english: Ombudsman found inquire after one hour, one is bear said doctors saved him.
sentences.chinese: 特派員發現蘇乙後進行詢問，蘇乙稱是熊醫生救了他。

sentences.english: Resident audit officers shall, according to the authorization of audit institutions, conduct audit work in accordance with the law.
sentences.chinese: 審計特派員根據審計機關的授權，依法進行審計工作。

sentences.english: She works for America's Federal Bureau of Investigation.
sentences.chinese: 閣下，美國聯邦調查局特派員弗勒裏和他的同僚。

sentences.english: The following case is a typical example of the Ombudsman's work.
sentences.chinese: 下述事件是司法特派員工作的一個典型例子。

sentences.english: Dai Jinhua rate team first river crossing, matt to send some difficulty there.
sentences.chinese: 戴金花率隊先行渡河，馬特派員那裏有些困難。

sentences.english: You must get prepared to receive the special commissioners this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 你們要做好下午迎接特派員的準備工作。

sentences.english: The Ombudsman is not subject to political pressure.
sentences.chinese: 司法特派員不受政治壓力的影響。

sentences.english: All he wanted in return was a federal agent's badge.
sentences.chinese: 作爲回報，他只要一枚聯邦特派員的徽章。

sentences.english: Your excellency, special agent Fleury of the Federal Bureau of Investigation and his colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 閣下，美國聯邦調查局特派員弗勒裏和他的同僚。

definition: Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (abbr. for 中央人民政府駐香港特別行政區聯絡辦公室|中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室[Zhong1 yang1 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 fu3 Zhu4 Xiang1 gang3 Te4 bie2 Xing2 zheng4 qu1 Lian2 luo4 Ban4 gong1 shi4]) or the equivalent office in Macao
head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to learn on the job/to be on probation
abbr. for 民主建港協進聯盟|民主建港协进联盟, Democratic alliance for the betterment of Hong Kong (DAB), Hong Kong pro-Beijing party
